thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 10 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Efore Agrees On Short Term Financing Arrangement Of EUR 4.4 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Efore Agrees On Short Term Financing Arrangement Of EUR 4.4 Million
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - EFORE PLC:
* TERM FINANCING ARRANGEMENT AND PLANS RIGHTS OFFERING * PLC HAS AGREED ON A SHORT-TERM FINANCING ARRANGEMENT OF EUR 4,4 MILLION WITH A NUMBER OF COMPANY SHAREHOLDERS
* TO PROPOSE TO AN EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS THAT BOARD BE AUTHORIZED TO RESOLVE ON A RIGHTS ISSUE
* COMPANY WILL ISSUE A NOTICE OF GENERAL MEETING ON A SEPARATE RELEASE LATER.
* TARGETED SIZE OF RIGHTS OFFERING IS TOTAL EUR 10-13 MILLION
* TARGETED SIZE OF RIGHTS OFFERING IS TOTAL EUR 10-13 MILLION. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
